puns.content:
Yes because the [Detect Lie](https://www.notion.so/content-warehouse/Detect-Lie-80e3fab2284f4fc2b8dfa48c1120bf93?source=copy_link) skill states:
- *The veracity of the statement is based on what the player, not the character, knows is the truth. Therefore, if the character is intentionally lying or lying under compulsion (charm effect, Forget and Remember poison, etc.), they are lying and will detect as such. Even if the characterâ€™s perception of the truth is skewed, the skill will detect the statement as a lie.*
puns.author: Paolo (Tribon) [Osawawaic]

puns.content:
HOWEVER, most players would say No because usually people play the Detect Lie skill as a conduit of the character

And, because the *character* has short term memory (assuming that their memory is reset at a short enough length for them to forget the reasoning of why they are holding the door open), then the player *in practice* would say, "No"
puns.author: Paolo (Tribon) [Osawawaic]

puns.author: Alyssa (TezzieğŸ›¡)

puns.content:
Jynx Summary:
Friday Night: relatively chill, got possessed during nathan fight and downed Liluth, also somehow managed to avoid paralysis circle by like an inch. Mith conversation of high levels of intensity.

Saturday: Went on a rescue mission for Xak Vic, got Lady Chaos with a clothespin and they didn't obliterate me. Helped name the different monster sweat flavors at the bar with Dez and Lord Donavan. guard duty after, came back to hear all about Sean Vicks vs Baz. Pranked a bunch of people with feign death, and then had a conversation about wtf was going on in Avalon with a bunch of powerful mages. At night got jumped by a bunch of undead and had to sell my soul to save people, got shit for it from *everyone* for it.

Sunday: Guard duty, did some investigating for Eros and talked to a bunch of nobles about the soul selling, (Lady Cora kill spelled a certain goose for fun....) scared the piss out of Ekko  ON ACCIDENT and got my shit rocked (at least they dragged me in like a wet cat and got me healed), big scary fight between (3?) hierarchs! Sir Garen is the goat! Got my soul back...? Had a conversation with Max about joining the dale! Tried to go to bed, walked out of cabin for two seconds and surrounded on all sides by corrupted darkwood. 5 spackets hit me in the chest and I hear five "kill spell"s....got death slaved for a bit before running into Ekko...who promptly beat me to a pulp AGAIN and then I got a life spell and sent on my way. Finally got back to my cabin and got invited to join Islewatch, Eastguard, and the Dale all at once. Finally got a ward on our cabin so we didnt get jumped again...
puns.author: ryan z (jynx ğ“…ª)

puns.content:
BUT that's why I love the roleplaying prompts as a NPC, because you can fully black out and start running with the most left field prompt and forget about it

Then when friends come up to you about those NPCs, you can be like, "I said that???"
puns.author: Paolo (Tribon) [Osawawaic]
